title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 141 - Volunteer Workers
content:

State Regulations
§ 141.0 - Statement of policy
§ 141.1 - Application for approval to accept the services of volunteer workers

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 9, subtit. C, pt. 141

Statutory authority: L. 1966, ch. 391

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
